title: Not Knot, topology mathematics knot theory educational video
description:
Not Knot is a guided tour into computer-animated hyperbolic space. It proceeds from the world of knots to their complementary spaces, what's not a knot. Profound theorems of mathematics show that most known complements carry the structure of hyperbolic geometry, a geometry in which the sum of three angles of a triangle always is less than 180 degrees.

The video shows the geometry of the knot complement, the space around the knot, changing into hyperbolic space
